Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Harlem (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to a minor fire at track level. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to the report of a minor fire at track level.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
